subject: Re: Another weird device
author: LC Duplatt
full_text:
Mike, that looks crazy!  We can call it the "Whack" instead of the 
Hack if it works!  Keep us posted... LOL!!

LC

<michaelcoletta@...> wrote:
>

dead???

me

with

I

Friday.
